name: Crescent Street A – South
description: The southern stretch of Crescent Street A is a quiet, orderly street with little civilian presence. Unlike the northern section, it lacks residential or commercial buildings and feels intentionally restrained. The street primarily serves as an approach to the local police station, reinforcing its official and controlled character.

snapshot.name: Crescent Street A – South
snapshot.location: Southern section of Crescent Street A, Cassandra
snapshot.description: The street is clean but subdued, lined with functional street lamps and largely empty sidewalks. Foot traffic is rare, and most passersby appear to be officers or individuals with official business. The atmosphere feels tense but contained, as though the area is constantly under quiet surveillance. Conversations are hushed, and lingering attracts subtle attention.

conditions.description: Street lamps provide steady but dull illumination, leaving corners and doorways in partial shadow.
Occasional distant footsteps, the murmur of voices from inside the police building, and the hum of street lights.

exits.description: The official entrance to the town’s police station, frequently guarded or observed.
Leads toward the busier northern section of Crescent Street A.

snapshot.keeperNotes: This street functions as a transitional space rather than a clue-rich location. Its primary narrative purpose is to establish mood and control before investigators enter the police station. Use subtle observation or NPC reactions to reinforce tension rather than overt clues.

connections.description: Both sections of Crescent Street A exist simultaneously and can be traversed freely.
